amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the Department of Defense should support the construction of schools in housing privatization agreements that severely impact student populations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3281 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3281 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S6478-6479; text: CR S6478-6479) To express the sense of the Senate that the Department of Defense should support the construction of schools in housing privatization agreements that severely impact student populations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3281 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Sarbanes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3281 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
